author: thma
msg: Now ODMG tx rollback also rolls back the state of the managed instances.
Thanks to Klaasjan Brands for this patch

author: thma
msg: add section on prerequisite jar archives

author: thma
msg: By providing a new subclass to org.odmg.TransactionAbortedexception we are now able to throw nested exceptions to the user. This my be helpful in identifying database related problems. Credits to Charles Anthony.
